citations.narrative:
Muddy conditions are present in front of the barn for the camels. The animals must walk through the mud and water to
access the shelter, and it may also affect the health of their feet. To be corrected by: June 20, 2022
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End Section

narrative:
3.127(c) 
   
Facilities, outdoor. 
Muddy conditions are present in front of the barn for the camels.  The animals must walk through the mud and water to 
access the shelter, and it may also affect the health of their feet.  To be corrected by:  June 20, 2022 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End Section
